The notes to the earlier Epodes are rather full, as I firmly believe that at least Epodes 1, 2, 7, 9, and 16 should be read before the Odes; but since many teachers do not hold this vieW‚ I have adapted my commentary on the first book to meet the needs of beginners there also.
